subject: Re: [junit] JUnit not matching to my needs - execute order shows design flaw ?
msgSnippet: ... And wasn t my use of the subjunctive impressive? :) (How many of you thought that was a typo?) -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Jason Rogers wrote:

> > > With all due respect, I believe that is a code smell.
> >
> > With equally great respect, even though the code smell, Curt must
> test it.
>
> Ouch! That's true.

And wasn't my use of the subjunctive impressive? :) (How many of you
thought that was a typo?)
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
